void StiKalmanTrackNode::getMomentum (  double    p[3],
double    e[6] = 0
)  const
 

returns the node information double& alpha : angle of the local reference frame double& xRef : refence position of this node in the local frame double x[5], : state, for a definition, see the top of this file double cc[15] : error matrix of the state "x" double& dEdx : energy loss info double& chi2) : chi2 of the track at this node
